description: This file defines a React component 'LudoBoard' which renders a graphical representation of a Ludo game board along with player pieces positioned based on their game progress. It uses React hooks and dynamic rendering to visualize the game state.

methods.name: LudoBoard()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Ludo game board and player pieces

methods.name: renderPieces
methods.description: Handles rendering of player pieces positioned on the board based on their progress
